AR 11. In disclosing its alignment of its policies with the UN Guiding Principles on Business and
Human Rights, the undertaking shall consider that the Guiding Principles refer to the
International Bill of Human Rights, which consists of the Universal Declaration of Human
Rights and the two Covenants that implement it, and may disclose its alignment with these
instruments.
